Among the options, autosomal recessive inheritance is the most likely mode. X-linked dominant inheritance would affect males more severely than females, which is not the case in this patient. X-linked recessive inheritance would only affect males or carriers, and mitochondrial inheritance would only affect offspring from affected mothers.
